articles.title: Kmart Australia shoppers go wild over new $19 camping gadget: 'I need this'
articles.author: CARINA STATHIS
articles.summary: Kmart Australia has launched the Stove Top Jaffle Maker for $19, designed for making toasted sandwiches, toast, and waffles on a stovetop. Additionally, Kmart released a $1.75 can strainer, a kitchen essential slid onto the top of any can to drain liquid with ease while ensuring no food falls into the sink.

articles.title: What Could a Production Genesis X Gran Equator Concept Look Like?
articles.author: Cole Attisha
articles.summary: Genesis debuted the GV90 SUV concept, an all-electric vehicle for their portfolio, and is considering the X Gran Equator Concept for production, aiming to compete with Land Rover and Lexus in the luxury off-road SUV market. The concept, speculated to utilize a twin-turbocharged 3.5-liter V6 engine from the GV80, focuses on combining off-road capability with Genesis's known interior comfort and build quality.

articles.title: New 8,000 sq. ft. Mediterranean restaurant with large patio to open in Vancouver
articles.summary: Glowbal Restaurant Group is launching a new Mediterranean restaurant concept called Gigi's in Vancouver's financial district. The 8,000 sq. ft. restaurant will seat 220 guests and feature a large patio, offering a vibrant and stylish dining experience.

articles.title: o4-mini Is Much More Than Just Another AI Model. It's OpenAI's Tesla Model 3
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced o4-mini, an 'economical' AI model that democratizes premium AI features with a competitive price of $1.10 per million tokens input and $4.40 per million tokens output. The o4-mini allows ChatGPT Plus user ($20/month) to access features that previously required Pro ($200/month) or Enterprise (thousands) subscriptions. It is also capable of using all ChatGPT tools: web browsing, running Python code, parsing, and generating images.

articles.title: This $11 Blowout Spray Will Have You Cancelling Your Next Keratin Treatment
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: John Frieda launched Frizz Ease Smooth Operator Blowout Spray, priced at $11 on Amazon. The spray protects against humidity, adds shine, acts as a heat protectant and transforms hair into salon-quality style, lasting up to three shampoos.

articles.title: Judge says Google has illegally built 'monopoly power' with its web advertising business
articles.summary: KENS 5 is offering a new service: streaming on phones. Users need the KENS 5 app to access this streaming service.

articles.title: Posted Apr 17, 2025 at 4:40 PM EDT 1 Comment / 1 New
articles.author: Adi Robertson
articles.summary: The Onion satirically introduced "Apple Deli+", a fictional new service for iPad users. This service is available for a trial period of three months on new iPads.

articles.title: 'I still don't know if I like being locked into the Apple meat ecosystem.'
articles.author: Adi Robertson
articles.summary: The Onion satirically announces the new iPad offers 3 months of "Apple Deli+" service.

articles.title: NexuMind Launches First Arabic AI Shopping Assistant for Saudi Arabia, Enhancing the Rakhys Platform Experience
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NexuMind, a Saudi AI startup, launched Rakhys, an Arabic AI Shopping Assistant. This product aims to bring advanced AI technology to Arabic-speaking consumers' daily shopping experiences.

articles.title: Newk's Eatery Welcomes Spring With Fresh Flavors and Fan-Favorite Dishes
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: Newk's Eatery is adding the Pesto Pasta Chicken Caesar Salad to its permanent menu due to popular demand. They are also highlighting the Pesto Chicken Sandwich and Chicken Caesar Wrap for spring, while offering Broccoli Cheddar Soup and Coconut Cake for a limited time. These spring flavors are available from April 16 through June 22, with the Spring Cup staying through summer.

articles.title: Trump Waved Off Planned Israeli Strike on Iranian Nuclear Sites - The…
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. To promote the new product line, the company collaborates with an agency to create targeted profiles of wealthy young parents or couples. These profiles will be used to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Editor confessions: 22 embarrassing sanity savers that we use on the sly
articles.summary: Yahoo editors are revealing their go-to products for everyday problems. One such product is Poo-Pourri's Before-You-Go toilet spray, which one editor claims is essential and won't leave home without.

articles.title: Just look at Huawei's trifold phone
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate XT, a trifold smartphone featuring a 6.4-inch to 10.2-inch display, depending on its folding state. The phone runs on HarmonyOS 4.2 and offers a unique user experience, though it lacks official Google Mobile Services support.

articles.title: Opportunity presented: NL government makes new snow crab primary processing licences available
articles.author: Gary Kean
articles.summary: The Newfoundland and Labrador government launched the Industry Balance and Opportunity Licensing Approach, offering snow crab processing licenses to groups of eligible fish harvesters. This initiative enables harvesters to form cooperative processing entities, promoting competition and increasing capacity within the snow crab industry. Harvester groups issued a primary crab processing licence will have to comply with the requirements within legislation, regulations and policy.

articles.title: Nike and Hyperice to release the Hyperboot warm-up footwear for athletes on May 17
articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.summary: The Hyperboot, introduced in the summer of 2024, is a "heat and dynamic air-compression massage tool" designed to be worn like high-top shoes. Equipped with dual-air bladders and heating elements, it massages the wearer's feet with sequential compression patterns.

articles.title: Dyson just slashed the price of its Supersonic Nural™ hair dryer
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on its hair tools during its Dyson Week sales event, including a $100 markdown on the Supersonic Nural™ hair dryer. The Supersonic Nural hairdryer is an updated version with 'Nural' sensors that adjust airflow and temperature for enhanced shine and scalp protection, and it includes new intelligent attachments for improved styling.

articles.title: Chrysler Brand Marks a Century of Automotive Innovation
articles.author: Tim Keenan
articles.summary: Chrysler is celebrating its 100th anniversary with a showcase at the New York International Auto Show, featuring the 1924 Chrysler Six, 2025 Chrysler Pacifica, and the Chrysler Halcyon Concept, which represents future design themes. The brand also plans to release a refreshed Chrysler Pacifica in 2026 and a new crossover inspired by the Halcyon concept.

articles.title: The Case For 'Scentscaping' Your Wedding, By A Fragrance-Obsessed Bride
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: The trend of 'scentscaping' weddings is growing, with couples using custom scents to enhance the experience. Brands like Diptyque, Jo Malone, Maison Louis Marie, and Phlur are offering products like candles, diffusers, and room sprays for this purpose, incorporating a variety of scents like florals, citrus, and woody notes inspired by locations and memories. Olfactory NYC offers custom fragrance creation services for weddings.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Ti Out Now, Priced at $379 for 8 GB and $429 ...
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nvidia has announced the launch of the Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Ti, a mid-range GPU in its RTX 50-series graphics cards. The company also announced the RTX 5060.

articles.title: Ryobi's cordless power washer becomes 'new favourite tool' amid £110 saving bundle deal
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Ryobi is offering a promotion on its 18V ONE+ Cordless 22bar Power Washer, priced at £149.99. The deal includes a free accessory bundle and an additional discount using code WASHER15, reducing the price to £139.99. This power washer is a versatile and cordless tool for cleaning gardens and vehicles.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Plus review: This is the best Chromebook money can buy
articles.author: Alun Taylor
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Chromebook Plus, a Chromebook with a high-quality part-metal build and an OLED display, starting at £649.  It is available in two models: one with a six-core Intel Core 3 100U processor and another with a ten-core Core 5 120U chip.  The Galaxy Chromebook Plus is positioned as a premium laptop offering good value for money.

articles.title: PING rolls out new cart bag range
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: PING has unveiled its latest range of cart bags.

articles.title: Moments Lab, Satisfaction Group Partner To Transform Unscripted Content Management Using AI
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Moments Lab and Satisfaction Group have partnered to transform unscripted audiovisual content management and monetization using AI. This partnership leverages Moments Lab's MXT-2 AI platform to index, share, and exploit Satisfaction Group's extensive content catalog, enabling content search, discovery, and repurposing. The collaboration aims to scale content repurposing and monetization, and includes the development of a B2B media marketplace for content transactions.

articles.title: Aldi Nando's dupe which could save shoppers over £53
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its "Roosters" range, a collection of products designed as dupes of Nando's menu items. The range includes items like peri-salted chips, chicken thigh fillets, and various sides, all offered at prices significantly lower than Nando's. The range is available in Aldi stores from April 3rd.

articles.title: Best Apple Watch 2024: Buyer's Guide to the Series 10, SE & More
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: The article compares the new Series 10 with the SE model, helping consumers decide which version to purchase. It provides information to figure out which version to get and which to avoid.

articles.title: The OnePlus 12 still competes with today's best phones - and it's on sale
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: OnePlus is offering a promotion on the OnePlus 12, with the 512GB storage version available for $750, a $150 discount. The deal applies to the Silky Black and Flowy Emerald color options via the company's official store. The OnePlus 12 is described as a complete handset with fast charging, a flagship camera, and reliable performance.

articles.title: SODI Launches Innovative Aroma Scent Phone Case on Kickstarter -- Blending Technology with Scented Emotion
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: SODI, an Apple accessories brand, has launched the Aroma Scent Phone Case on Kickstarter. This innovative iPhone case combines emotional design and functionality, allowing users to express their personality through scent. Early supporters can access exclusive discounts and bundles through the Kickstarter campaign.

articles.title: Beauty buffs 'running' to Home Bargains for new £1.49 hair products similar to £34 brand
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Home Bargains has introduced a new affordable hair product line called OVAU, marketed as 'dupes' for OUAI products, priced at £1.49 each. Additionally, Olaplex No. 7 Bonding Oil is currently offered at a discounted price of £22 on Amazon.

articles.title: Roomba chases Chinese rivals with lidar-equipped robot vacuums
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Roomba is launching a new lineup of robot vacuum models featuring lidar sensors for enhanced cleaning capabilities. These new models, unveiled on Wednesday, are scheduled to be available on Friday.

articles.title: Next £56 dress perfect for summer getaway as shoppers call it 'really pretty'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Pink Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £56, available in various colors and prints, crafted from a lightweight cotton-viscose blend. It is available in sizes 6 to 20-Tall and is recommended to be paired with sandals and a raffia bag. Alternatively, Marks & Spencer offers the Pure Cotton Mini Drop Waist Dress for £35.

articles.title: Amaze Unveils Next-Gen Teespring Marketplace, Streamlining Opportunities for All Creators in $480B E-Commerce Industry
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amaze (NYSE American:AMZE) announced a major update to its Teespring Marketplace. The update features a new design and enhanced discovery features. These changes aim to make it easier for fans to shop and for creators to get discovered.

articles.title: Charles Pan Fried Chicken: the legendary New York restaurant is coming to London for the first time
articles.author: Josh Barrie
articles.summary: Truffle Burger is launching a new concept in London this summer to share good food and independent brands. This concept draws on inspiration from collaborations and connections made in NYC and around the globe.

articles.title: Zambia: Three entrepreneurs building agriculture and food businesses
articles.author: Jaco Maritz
articles.summary: Java Foods, founded by Monica Musonda, produces and distributes Eezee Noodles, and after a capital raise in 2018, they built a factory to start producing noodles locally using Zambian-grown wheat, selling over four million packs each month. Luano Food Company, run by Miit Pandoliker, focuses on value-added food products, with honey at its core.

articles.title: NowVertical Launches DataCatalyst on Microsoft Azure Marketplace, Unlocking Enterprise AI at Scale
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NowVertical Group Inc. launched its DataCatalyst Solution on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. DataCatalyst is an Azure-native solution aimed at unifying and operationalizing enterprise data, facilitating AI adoption. The solution promises to reduce time-to-value on data products and integration costs.

articles.title: 43 Budget-Friendly Products So Good, You'll Probably Forget About The More Expensive Versions
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of new or noteworthy products from various companies, highlighting their features and benefits, often in comparison to more expensive alternatives. E.l.f. launched Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen. Rael Beauty introduced Miracle Patch. LilyAna Naturals launched eye cream.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Expands Availability of CWENCH Hydration™ at all Fortinos Locations in Ontario
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands Corporation announced that Fortinos has added CWENCH Hydration™ RTD to all 24 of its locations starting April 17, 2025. All four original flavors of CWENCH Hydration™ RTD are available at Fortinos stores and through PC Express. This launch complements the successful February launch of CWENCH's Hydration Mix across the chain's stores.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce Graphics Driver 576.02
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the GeForce Graphics Driver 576.02, which includes support for the GeForce RTX 5060 Ti and DLSS Multi Frame Generation updates for Black Myth: Wukong and No More Room In Hell 2. The driver also includes support for CUDA 12.9 and several new G-Sync monitors from Acer, ASUS, Dell, Dough, HP, GIGABYTE, LG, and Samsung.

articles.title: Kärcher Window Vacuum WV2 review: A versatile cleaning gadget for streak-free windows and mirrors
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: The Kärcher WV2 Window Vacuum is a budget-friendly option for streak-free cleaning on windows, mirrors, and shower screens. It is lightweight and easy to use, with a 28cm suction nozzle and a 100ml water tank. Kärcher also recommends using only its specially formulated detergents to avoid damage and ensure the best results.

articles.title: A Classic ‘SD Gundam' Mobile Suit Gets Its First Toy After 25 Years
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A toy based on a mobile suit from 'SD Gundam G Generation Eternal' series is launching after 25 years.

articles.title: Kenosha man hopes Shark Tank goes nuts for his Go Nutz body shaver
articles.author: ELIZABETH SNYDER
articles.summary: Private Grooming markets 'Go Nutz,' an electric razor designed for body hair (excluding the face). Its distinctive features include a spherical shape, waterproof design, and matte black finish. The product experienced an initial sales surge due to a viral TikTok video, and the owner of the company appeared on 'Shark Tank' to seek investment for the product.

articles.title: Will Kenoshan's product be picked up on ABC's Shark Tank?
articles.author: Liz Snyder
articles.summary: Private Grooming is marketing Go Nutz, an electric razor designed for body hair trimming, excluding the face. Sales initially surged due to a viral TikTok video, but later stalled due to inventory issues. The company and its founder, Landon McKinnis, appeared on Shark Tank to secure investment and boost publicity for the product.

articles.title: Will Kenosha entrepreneur's product be picked up on ABC's Shark Tank?
articles.author: ELIZABETH SNYDER
articles.summary: Private Grooming is marketing Go Nutz, an electric razor designed for body grooming. Sales initially surged due to a viral TikTok video, and the company founder appeared on 'Shark Tank' to seek investment. Go Nutz is waterproof, spherical shaped with no exposed teeth.

articles.title: Rasha Thadani paints dull subway with ‘Colour Me Moto' shades
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Motorola has launched its first laptop, the Moto Book 60, and a new generation of tablets, the Moto Pad 60 Pro. The company has partnered with Thadani to represent the brand and its vision of empowering the next generation with smart, stylish, and performance-driven technology. The devices integrate AI to make tech more intuitive and empowering for young users.

articles.title: 'Hoover's robot vacuum cleans my house while I lie in bed – I'm obsessed'
articles.author: Ines Santos
articles.summary: Hoover launched the HG4 Robot Vacuum Cleaner, now available for £199 at Amazon, Hoover, and Currys. The HG4 features include suitability for carpets and hard floors, a combi roller, a side brush, up to 4000Pa of suction, and app-controlled scheduling with virtual walls.

articles.title: P.E.I. sees first cannabis trade show
articles.author: Vivian Ulinwa
articles.summary: Fresh Island Grown showcased its FIGR brand, focusing on dried flower and pre-rolls, and launched Reptide, a new line of stronger, flavour-focused products, including infused pre-rolls and vapes, at the Cannabis East trade show. The company aims to educate consumers about their products and reduce the stigma surrounding cannabis through events like these.

articles.title: Dyson's best-selling Airwrap Styler got a cool, purple makeover for Mother's Day 💜
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Dyson has launched new, limited-edition 'Jasper Plum' colorways for its popular hair styling tools, including the Airwrap Multistyler, Supersonic Hair Dryer, and Airstrait Straightener, in celebration of Mother's Day 2025. This new colorway offers a stylish update to these existing devices.

articles.title: Dyson's best-selling Airwrap Styler got a cool, purple makeover for Mother's Day 💜
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Dyson has launched limited-edition versions of its Airwrap Multi-Styler, Supersonic Hair Dryer, and Airstrait Straightener in a new "Jasper Plum" colorway. These updated hair tools offer the same functionality as the original versions but with a new, seasonal color, released in celebration of Mother's Day 2025.

articles.title: Visa's Global Product Drop Set for April 30th
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Visa will unveil its 2025 roadmap along with new products, solutions, and technology partners at its Product Drop event on April 30 in San Francisco. These new offerings aim to transform commerce using AI. Visa CEO Ryan McInerney and Visa Chief Product and Strategy Officer Jack Forestell will present these new developments.

articles.title: Forget about the Nintendo Switch 2, I'm hoping for an Nvidia Shield 2
articles.author: Ty Sherback
articles.summary: The article discusses the possibility of Nvidia launching a new handheld gaming device, the Shield 2. It speculates that the new device would focus on cloud gaming and streaming via Nvidia's GeForce NOW service. The Shield 2 is positioned as an alternative to devices like the Nintendo Switch 2, offering greater flexibility and the ability to stream games from personal computers.

articles.title: Boden's 'comfortable and chic' linen shirt dress comes in four 'vibrant' patterns
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Boden is launching the Alexa Linen Maxi Shirt Dress, available in four vibrant patterns and sizes four to 22. The retailer is offering a 15% discount with code NB7C, bringing the price down to £132.60.

articles.title: The Capitalist: AI Jesus, banter bans and tales from the Westminster Arms
articles.author: The Capitalist
articles.summary: AI Jesus is a new service offered at www.aiJesus.live. It features a 3D avatar of Christ, powered by generative AI, who answers user questions in biblical verse and provides product recommendations.

articles.title: Sol De Janeiro shoppers can get €48 body butter for just €10 thanks to sale
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched Delicia Drench Body Butter, known for its scent and skin-smoothing properties. Space NK offers the body butter individually and within the Gimme Gimme Minis set, which includes other Sol de Janeiro bestsellers like Beija Flor Elasti-Cream and Cheirosa perfume mists.

articles.title: Dyson's new Supersonic r dried my long hair in 5 minutes – but do you need a professional hairdryer at home?
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic r hairdryer in February 2024, priced at £449.99. It is smaller, lighter, and more powerful than the original Dyson Supersonic. The Supersonic r comes in straight-wavy and curly-coily bundles, each including attachments like the flyaway attachment and pro-concentrator nozzle.

articles.title: Dyson's new Supersonic r dried my long hair in 5 minutes – but do you need a professional hairdryer at home?
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic r hairdryer in February 2024, initially available for professional hairdressers. The Supersonic r is smaller, lighter, and more powerful than the original Dyson Supersonic, featuring new styling attachments with RFID technology for automatically adjusted heat and power settings.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus launched: S Pen experience without the Galaxy S25 Ultra price tag?
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus in India, a mid-range phone featuring a built-in stylus, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, and 8GB of RAM, priced at ₹22,999. The phone includes stylus-specific features like Moto Notes and AI-powered sketch-to-image conversion. The Motorola Edge Stylus goes on sale in India starting 23 April.

articles.title: "The ultimate goal of PurpleLexity, which is transforming from a search engine to an answer engine, ..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: Purple Lexity aims to transform from a search engine to an action engine, providing AI-powered answers and assistance. Earlier this year, Purple Lexity introduced the 'Purplexity Assistant' Android app. In November of last year, it also introduced an AI-based shopping function for paid subscribers in the United States.

articles.title: Crushon AI: The Best Free Janitor AI Alternative for NSFW AI
articles.summary: Crushon AI is presented as a stable and reliable alternative to Janitor AI, which faces issues like downtime and access restrictions. Crushon AI prioritizes accessibility and emotional continuity, with future plans including text-to-image synthesis and voice-controlled AI interactions to enhance the companion AI experience. It is introduced as a solution for users seeking a seamless and unfiltered NSFW AI chat experience.

articles.title: High Performance Shared cPanel Web Hosting
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: The company offers cost-effective hosting solutions featuring 15 GB NVMe SSD storage and unlimited bandwidth. These hosting solutions deliver speed and reliability through cutting-edge, eco-friendly infrastructure.

articles.title: SenseTime unveils large model SenseNova V6
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: SenseTime launched SenseNova V6, an upgraded large model series, on April 10. SenseNova V6 is described as China's most advanced multimodal model with the lowest cost in the industry, aiming to integrate AI into everyday life and unlock possibilities in reasoning and intelligence.

articles.title: MTN App gets a revamp
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: MTN South Africa has launched the next-generation version of the MTN App, offering enhanced security, personalized experiences, and app-only deals. The updated app includes features like DataShare and a dark mode, focusing on innovation and customer needs. A successful beta test preceded the full launch.

articles.author: Красимир Ангелов
articles.summary: Google introduced Google News Showcase, a product or service designed to showcase news content.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils ‘AI Home' Vision with New Bespoke Smart Appliances
articles.author: Samsung Electronics Singapore
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore launched its Bespoke AI appliance lineup, featuring AI-enhanced refrigerators, laundry combos, vacuum cleaners, and air conditioners. These appliances boast features like AI Wash, AI Energy Mode, and upgraded Bixby voice assistant, along with Samsung Knox security features. The Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaner features upgraded AI Cleaning Mode and high suction power.

articles.title: Samsung unveils AI-powered appliances, including fridges that can double as a smart home hub
articles.author: Christopher Fam
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its refreshed Bespoke AI smart home appliance lineup, including the 2025 Bespoke AI Side-by-Side Refrigerator with features like auto-open doors and a screen for managing smart home devices. Also released were the Bespoke AI Top-Load Washer lineup with AI wash mode and the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra cordless stick vacuum cleaner with AI-powered floor detection.

articles.title: Pisi to Host Exclusive Webinar for Business and Marketing Leaders
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Pisi, a Nigerian adtech company, is launching new adtech products on TikTok and Telegram, which will enable businesses to engage consumers on their preferred platforms. Pisi will host a webinar on April 23, 2025, to demonstrate the advertising solutions for TikTok and feature speakers including Bukayo Ewuoso, Head of Business, Adtech at Pisi and Natia Vacharadze, Client Solutions Manager to showcase the advertising solutions for TikTok and review case studies.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils 'AI Home' Vision with New Bespoke AI Appliances
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new line of Bespoke AI appliances, including the Bespoke AI Refrigerator, Bespoke AI Top Load Washer, and Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaner. These appliances feature AI-powered technologies like AI Wash, AI Energy Mode, and upgraded AI Cleaning Mode, designed to enhance user experience and efficiency. The Bespoke AI Refrigerator and Bespoke AI Laundry Top-load Washer are available for purchase on the Samsung Online Store and major consumer electronics stores.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils ‘AI Home' Vision with New Bespoke AI Appliances
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new Bespoke AI appliance lineup in Singapore, featuring the Bespoke AI Refrigerator, Bespoke AI Top Load Washer, and Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaner. These appliances offer AI-enhanced features for user convenience and efficiency, and are now available for purchase at the Samsung Online Store and major retailers.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils ‘AI Home' Vision with New Bespoke AI Appliances
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore launched its Bespoke AI appliances, including refrigerators, laundry combos, vacuum cleaners, and air conditioners. These appliances boast upgraded AI, intuitive screens, and enhanced features like AI Wash and AI Cleaning Mode. The new Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaner will be launched with the world's most powerful suction power of up to 400W.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils ‘AI Home' Vision with New Bespoke AI Appliances
articles.author: Samsung Electronics Singapore
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore launched its Bespoke AI appliance lineup, featuring AI-enhanced refrigerators, top-load washers, Jet Ultra and Jet Lite vacuum cleaners, and AirDresser. These appliances boast upgraded AI and intuitive screens and are now available for purchase, with promotional vouchers offered until May 7, 2025.

articles.title: High-end living brand Aloso launched "Aloso Cleaning Care Service" on the 17th.Aloso has researched ..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Aloso has launched "Aloso Cleaning Care Service", a sofa fabric cleaning service offering Standard and Premium options. The service utilizes specialized cleaning agents developed by Aloso to clean and sterilize sofas while preserving fabric quality. Customers can order and schedule the service through the Aloso website.

articles.title: Galderma launches new ALASTIN Restorative Skin Complex with Next Generation TriHex Technology®
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Galderma's ALASTIN has launched Restorative Skin Complex with Next Generation TriHex Technology® (TriHex+™), a multi-functional rejuvenating serum. The enhanced formula includes Octapeptide-45 and Magnolol to regenerate collagen and elastin, addressing fine lines and volume loss. It will be available in the United States through authorized ALASTIN skincare providers.

articles.title: 2025 Kia Tasman price and specs: Australian orders open for Korean brand's first ute
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Kia Tasman is now available for order in Australia. First customer deliveries are expected to begin in July.

articles.title: 2025 Kia Tasman price and specs: Australian orders open for Korean brand's first ute
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Kia Tasman offers a payload capacity exceeding 1000kg across all variants. Buyers can choose a sub-one tonne payload option at no extra cost, enabling the ute to qualify for novated leasing.

articles.title: This Dyson Vacuum Is the Perfect Spring-Cleaning Companion, and Now It's $150 Off
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: Dyson's V15 cordless vacuum cleaner is highlighted for its powerful suction and performance, earning CNET Editors' Choice Award. It is currently offered with a $150 discount on Dyson's website, reducing the price to $600.

articles.title: Girls Get Off Pillow Review: ‘Changed my sex life'
articles.author: Laura Roscioli
articles.summary: Girls Get Off, a sexual wellness brand, has launched Bumpy Cuddles, a pillow designed to elevate the pelvis for deeper penetration and enhanced sensation. The product aims to improve the user's sex life by providing ergonomic support and optimizing positioning during sexual activity. It features high-quality foam, a removable washable cover, and a waterproof liner.

articles.title: Amazon has Shark's newest customizable TurboBlade tower fan for $250 in two colors
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Shark launched its new bladeless tower fan last month. Amazon customers are already praising the product as a significant improvement to their quality of life.

articles.title: The PC upgrade you've been waiting for—get this Microsoft Surface for less than $200
articles.author: Deal Post Team
articles.summary: Microsoft Surface laptops are available as new open-box items with an 11.6-inch display and connectivity ports. These laptops have Windows 11 SE pre-installed and are being offered at a discounted price of $189.99.

articles.title: Motorola launches Edge 60 stylus in India for budget buyers
articles.author: NH Bureau Thursday
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 60 stylus smartphone in India, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, Android 15, a 50MP dual rear camera, and a 6.67-inch 1.5K pOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. Available from April 23, 2025, the phone is priced at Rs ₹22,999 and can be purchased via Flipkart, Motorola's website, and select retail stores.

articles.title: Are 7 KG Washing Machine Good For Small Families In India (April 2025)
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, and Haier offer 7 KG washing machines suitable for couples and small families. These models include features like inverter motors, multiple wash programs, high RPM spin speeds, auto tub clean mode, and are designed for hard water and low pressure conditions. The machines are energy-efficient, durable, and available at affordable prices.

articles.title: Gen Zeekr: Driving an EV for the first-time
articles.author: Tanya Shukla
articles.summary: The Zeekr 009, a six- or seven-seat luxury electric MPV, features a 17-inch 3K OLED screen, a 30-speaker YAMAHA sound system, and offers a range of up to 582km. It accelerates from 0 to 100 km/h in 4.5 seconds and can be charged from 10% to 80% in 30 minutes using 205kW DC fast charging.

articles.title: Recharge announces AI-powered Concierge SMS at ChargeX global conference
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Recharge has introduced its new AI-powered Concierge SMS product at the ChargeX event in Los Angeles. The product aims to demonstrate the impact of AI within the ecommerce space.

articles.title: FACT: Idahoans Will Soon Be Scanning Codes In Sky To Buy Stuff
articles.author: Greg Jannetta
articles.summary: Companies may soon use drones to display laser beam QR codes for advertising and sales, allowing customers to purchase goods by scanning the codes with their phones. This technology, which has been tested in Shanghai, could revolutionize advertising and purchasing in the coming decade.

articles.title: Gadgets of the week: ASICS Novablast 5, Ultraprolink Juice-UP 120, iQOO Z10X 5G and AKAI 'Kaashmir' AC
articles.author: Ashok Pandian
articles.summary: ASICS launched Novablast 5 TCSW10K 2025 Limited Edition shoe with FF BLAST MAX cushioning. Ultraprolink introduced Juice-UP 120 powerbank with 24000mAH battery. iQOO launched Z10X 5G phone with MediaTek Dimensity 7300 5G processor. AKAI launched 'Kaashmir' range of Air conditioners and Lumio Vision is launching Lumio 7 and Lumio 9 SmartTVs. Karban launched Airzone Lite which is smart device that provides the function of an air purifier, bladeless fan and light all in one. Kawasaki showcased Corleo, a Concept 01 personal mobility vehicle.

articles.title: Will Kenoshan's product be picked up on ABC's Shark Tank?
articles.author: Madison
articles.summary: Private Grooming markets Go Nutz, an electric razor designed for safe and comfortable body hair trimming. Landon McKinnis, the founder, sought investors for Private Grooming and the Go Nutz product. The company developed Go Nutz to fill a gap in the market for body hair trimmers.

articles.title: Asda praised for launching new service at 'fair price' in UK stores
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Asda is introducing a service, promising the "lowest price in the market."

articles.title: Samsung's Newest Phone Is Built to Take a Beating
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy XCover7 Pro and Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro, focusing on durability. The devices feature swappable batteries and guaranteed OS and security updates.

articles.title: Lids Unveils Revamped Retail Experience with Personalized 'Build-A-Cap' Kiosks and Localized Flair
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Global sports retailer Lids has launched a new store concept. This concept aims to transform the in-store experience for customers.

articles.title: Kenosha man hopes Shark Tank goes nuts for Go Nutz shaver
articles.author: Madison
articles.summary: Private Grooming is marketing Go Nutz, an electric razor designed for safely shaving body hair. This product aims to fill a gap in the market for trimmers specifically designed for body hair grooming.

articles.title: o3, o4, 'oh My': First Impressions From OpenAI's New Models Compared To Alternatives
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced new o3 and o4 models. These models are being compared against Claude 3.7 to determine performance and value for everyday tasks.

articles.title: Moto G Stylus (2025) Hands-On: A Taste of AI at a Lower Price
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Stylus is introducing new AI features at a lower price point.

articles.title: Test-Driving The Zeekr 7X: Can This Electric SUV Beat Tesla's Model Y?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Geely's Zeekr brand has launched its first midsize electric SUV in Europe. This electric SUV is fast, luxurious, and boasts a rapid charging speed, positioning it as a competitor to the Tesla Model Y.

articles.title: Half Price Packaging Redefines Unboxing Experiences with High-End Rigid Box Designs
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Half Price Packaging has unveiled a new collection of high-end rigid box designs. These designs aim to set a new industry standard for luxury packaging and unboxing experiences.

articles.title: SODI Launches Innovative Aroma Scent Phone Case on Kickstarter -- Blending Technology with Scented Emotion
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SODI, a premium Apple accessories brand, launched the Aroma Scent Phone Case, an innovative iPhone case, on Kickstarter. This new product combines emotional design, everyday functionality, and luxury.

articles.title: Nuventure Connect launches AI Innovation Lab
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Nuventure Connect introduces NuWave, their first specialized IoT digital platform. The platform is designed for IoT applications.

articles.title: I was a Drag x Drive skeptic, but playing the Nintendo Switch 2's wheelchair basketball ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is planning to launch its upcoming console, the Nintendo Switch 2. The Nintendo Switch 2 is considered a straightforward route for the company.

articles.title: Lyle & Scott launch ‘Where Tradition Meets Performance' video campaign
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Lyle & Scott, a leading apparel brand, has launched a new product or service.

articles.title: From kitchen stash to ketch-upgrade: Heinz Trade-Up gives everyone in Dubai a Heinz bottle in return for their unwanted ketchup sachets
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Heinz is introducing a new service where customers can exchange their accumulated ketchup sachets for a bottle of Heinz ketchup. This initiative aims to transform unwanted sachets found in homes into a more desirable product.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus launched: S Pen experience without the Galaxy S25 Ultra price tag?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus in the Indian market. The new Edge series phone features a stylus and is offered at a mid-range price.

articles.title: Will OpenAI's Social Network Become Just The Latest Twitter Clone?
articles.author: Peter Suciu
articles.summary: OpenAI is considering launching a new social media platform potentially leveraging its ChatGPT AI technology. The platform aims to compete with established players like Meta and X (formerly Twitter), but faces challenges in differentiating itself and attracting users in a saturated market. Analysts suggest the new platform needs unique features and innovation beyond simply replicating existing social media models.

articles.title: Anticipatory Selling: How To Shape Buyer Perceptions And Create Demand
articles.author: Renae Gregoire
articles.summary: Dyson utilized "anticipatory selling" by highlighting the flaws of traditional vacuums and positioning themselves as the solution. Gigabrands repositioned airtight containers focusing on longer herb freshness, resulting in a 35% higher click-through rate and a 24% increase in conversions. IKEA created flatpack designs, making furniture accessible to their young, mobile audience.

articles.title: o3, o4, 'oh My': First Impressions From OpenAI's New Models Compared To Alternatives
articles.author: Andrew Filev
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched new AI models, including GPT-4.1 and o4-mini-high. Initial impressions and practical comparisons of the new models are discussed, highlighting their potential uses for various tasks like research and information retrieval.
